course.title: Cognition and Psychopathology
course.description: The goal of this course is to give an in-depth understanding of the role of cognition in psychopathology. This includes a major focus on cognitive vulnerability theories of depression, anxiety, and suicide as well as exploration of the role of cognition in other psychopathology such as schizophrenia and eating disorders. By the end of the course, students will understand the major cognitive components of depression, anxiety, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, eating disorders, and suicide.
